attributes.action: Force able bodied unemployed to work for their benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unemployed able bodied persons to work for their benefits.  This includes litter picking, tidying up run down areas etc.

I think a few days outside during the great British winter, sweeping glass and scrubbing graffitti will sway them into the central heated job centre.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
